# Biweekly Report Generator

> AI-powered biweekly and quarterly report generator for GitHub organizations. Turns CSV commit/PR data into structured reports with AI summaries.

## What is this?

An open-source web application that generates biweekly development reports from GitHub CSV exports. Built for Tokamak Network's engineering team to automate progress reporting for investors, partners, and internal stakeholders.

## Key Features

- **CSV Upload**: Drag-and-drop GitHub export CSV files
- **Two Report Types**: Public/Investor (non-technical summaries) and Technical (developer-facing with GitHub links)
- **AI Summaries**: Uses OpenAI-compatible APIs (GPT, Gemini, DeepSeek) to generate natural language summaries
- **Multi-Model Support**: Run reports through multiple AI models simultaneously for comparison
- **Repository & Project Grouping**: Organize reports by repo or by project
- **Repo Limiting**: Focus on top N most active repos, group the rest as "Other"
- **Export Formats**: Markdown, CSV, TSV download

## Tech Stack

- Backend: Python 3.9+, FastAPI
- Frontend: Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS
- AI: OpenAI-compatible API (configurable model)

## Who built this?

Tokamak Network â€” an Ethereum Layer 2 protocol team. 15 engineers, 70+ active repositories, 2000+ commits every two weeks.
